title: Student and Staff Computing Devices SOURCING #168884
product: Student and staff computing devices, including laptops, desktops, tablet devices, and display monitors, as well as device accessories like sleeves, cases, mice, keyboards, and cables.
bid_summary: RFP JA-207652 from Dallas ISD for student and staff computing devices (laptops, desktops, tablets, monitors, accessories). Proposals are due by 2024-07-09. A pre-bid conference is scheduled for 2024-06-10.
product_specification: This RFP is for student and staff computing devices, including laptops, desktops, tablet devices, and display monitors. Vendors may submit proposals for one, several, or all categories of devices. The specifications listed are the minimum hardware requirements. Vendors must have the ability to provide significant quantities of devices. Purchases may also include a variety of device accessories such as sleeves, cases, mice, keyboards, and cables.
